text: int main ( ) { int n , o = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( o = 0 ; o < n ; o ++ ) { int k , u , j , i , l ; scanf ( "%d" , & k ) ; int * p [ k ] ; for ( u = 0 ; u < k ; u ++ ) { p [ u ] = ( int * ) malloc ( ( u + 1 ) * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( l = 0 ; l <= u ; l ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & p [ u ] [ l ] ) ; } for ( j = k - 2 ; j >= 0 ; j -- ) { for ( i = 0 ; i <= j + 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( p [ j + 1 ] [ i ] > p [ j + 1 ] [ i + 1 ] ) p [ j ] [ i ] = p [ j ] [ i ] + p [ j + 1 ] [ i ] ; else p [ j ] [ i ] = p [ j ] [ i ] + p [ j + 1 ] [ i + 1 ] ; } } printf ( "%d" , p [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } }
